plot outline: Seethakoka Chilaka 1981 Indian Telugu film, Directed by P. Bharathiraja and Produced Poornodaya. The film Stars Karthik, Mucherla Aruna, Sarath Babu, Jaggaiah, Master Ali, Smitha and Dubbing Janaki lead roles. The music of the film was composed by Ilayaraja.
title: Seethakoka Chiluka
plot: Seethakoka Chilaka 1981 Indian Telugu film, Directed by P. Bharathiraja and Produced Poornodaya. The film Stars Karthik, Mucherla Aruna, Sarath Babu, Jaggaiah, Master Ali, Smitha and Dubbing Janaki lead roles. The music of the film was composed by Ilayaraja.
